Game.Name: World Boxing (Japan)
Game.plot: World Boxing is a Sports game, developed by Natsume and published by TSS,which was released in Japan in 1990.Cheat: Cheat MenuPress and hold the A & B buttons on both controllers and press Reset. Now, on the title screen menu, press A, B and Start at the same time on controller 1. If done right, you'll enter the cheat menu.Cheat: Match PasswordsEnter the following at the password entry screen. Please note that on the password screen there are 2 pair of numbers in each bracket, one pair on top of another. Since I cannot display the numbers like that here, I will put the passwords like this [24 61]. The first two-digit number (24) will be the upper number and the second two-digit number (61) will be the bottom number.
Game.Notes: World Boxing is a Sports game, developed by Natsume and published by TSS, which was released in Japan in 1990.
